Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27542832] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1718 (EC50=36.5μg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592 (EC50=2.68μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 4157 (EC50=9.2μg/ml), Escherichia coli ATCC 51659 (EC50=2.51μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (EC50=38.6μg/ml),  Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 9955 (EC50=24.0μg/ml), Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1794 (EC50=2.36μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27542832] Not hemolytic to sheep red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.27542832] The cell proliferation of A549 human lung epithelial cells is 170%, 180%, 182%, 180% and 180% at peptide concentrations of 1 μg/ml, 10 μg/ml, 25 μg/ml, 50 μg/ml, 100 μg/ml
Sequence Information.Structure Description: A1P is primarily random coil with two anti-parallel
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: Peptides from American alligator plasma are antimicrobial against multi-drug resistant bacterial pathogens including Acinetobacter baumannii
Literature.Author: Barksdale SM, Hrifko EJ, Chung EM, van Hoek ML.
